title: how were i banned 14 days for this? xD also plz ignore my name :s
body:

ikbennederlandss: u never gouped anyway
ikbennederlandss: its ranked
ikbennederlandss: kys
ikbennederlandss: nah
ikbennederlandss: andwhy
ikbennederlandss: tell me
ikbennederlandss: cuz im trying to group?
ikbennederlandss: and win a teamfight?
ikbennederlandss: all u do is solo dying
ikbennederlandss: we did yes
ikbennederlandss: without you
ikbennederlandss: cuz u solo farm to
ikbennederlandss: and bot
ikbennederlandss: LOL

ikbennederlandss: yu fuck
ikbennederlandss: when?
ikbennederlandss: and thereres morde
ikbennederlandss: in base
ikbennederlandss: y
ikbennederlandss: he kinda is

ikbennederlandss: also he flames hard af
ikbennederlandss: k then reporthim for flaming

ikbennederlandss: so u would stop talking
ikbennederlandss: also thats the only thing i said

ikbennederlandss: i agree

ikbennederlandss: ur a tryhard yasuo maim

ikbennederlandss: no
ikbennederlandss: gg

Game 2

ikbennederlandss: leona ult
ikbennederlandss: smart one
ikbennederlandss: im a free elf
ikbennederlandss: i have no master
ikbennederlandss: im way to good for you
ikbennederlandss: :^)
ikbennederlandss: i lagged
ikbennederlandss: )^:
ikbennederlandss: go fuck yourself leblack
ikbennederlandss: leblanc
ikbennederlandss: no end plz
ikbennederlandss: let me penta
ikbennederlandss: plz

replies.body:
Well, you told morde to kill himself, that counts as a few strikes by riot instead of just one, yall were harassing each other... theres another.... told leblanc to go fuck herself, there's another....asking others to report someone is another. i'd continue but you get the point by now, hopefully.


Im pretty sure you do this consistently, i'd say you earned it.
Only one thing you missed - the racial/homophobic slur (represented by %%%%). Otherwise good analysis 👍

Thanks, i didn't feel like putting everything he said



I wonder why people do this and cant fathom how they were banned

actually asking people to report someone isn't a reportable offense Riot explained that scenario the act of asking to report someone if that is the only action is not reportable. so that's a -1 from the list but everything else is more than enough to get him banned.

It's debatable, it falls under the form of harassment, all you have to do is explain it to a riot member like that.


But then again, everything is subjective as far as reporting in  this game goes... outside of cheating and such

Well it also takes into account context, if all that is done is "report x for toxicity or trolling (assuming there is adequate proof of such like a support never buying a SS in a 30-40 minute game)" and they don't spam it throughout the game but say it like once when it becomes relevant and once at the end game stats screen then it can't even be construed as harrassment. It's a part of the whole tact concept that the judgements of toxicity falls under. Like, I tend to inform people the moment I decide that I will be reporting them end of game, sometimes they shape up because of it and I retract my decision, it's more of a "hey check yourself" notice, if by the end of the game they continued down their wrong path I'll then request that others affected by the individual also report them. As long as things are approached with common sense in this regards it can not be construed as harrasment. In fact, even Riot has a team that will pull other members of the company aside and be like "hey you done goofed, here's how we're gonna fix this situation" (I know because I was interviewed for a position on the team, but that's besides the point.) However, in many cases players will go to far in this instead of maintaining a cordial balance.

In this instance it can be construed as harassment, In a regular circumstance as you put for your example you would be correct, but if you're harassing someone consistently for an entiregame without stopping at anypoint, asking for a report from everyone else while you were flaming a person just adds it on as harassment.


Either way, it's subjective no matter how you try to argue about it.


Like arguing about what's toxic and what's not.

Ctrl F
 %

Aaaand there we have it:

>ikbennederlandss: fucking %%%

I'm going to go out on a limb there and assume that's a homophobic slur hidden behind those %-signs.

The log in general is fairly toxic, but perhaps not enough to earn an immediate 14 day ban... save for two comments which will definitely earn one every time.

You tell another player "kys," which is shorthand for "kill yourself." Encouraging another player to self harm is usually caused for an immediate 14-day ban.

In your second game you also use a homophobic slur. Derogatory language and hate speech is also cause for an immediate 14-day ban.
